raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

abn_branch.description: An ABN Branch (also known as a GST Branch) is used if part of your business needs to account for GST separately from its parent entity.
abn_branch.title: ABN Branch

abn_or_tfn.description: An ABN is necessary for operating a business, while a TFN (Tax File Number) is required for any person working in Australia.
abn_or_tfn.title: ABN or TFN

acn.description: The Australian Company Number (ACN) is a nine digit number with the last digit being a check digit calculated using a modified modulus 10 calculation. ASIC has adopted a convention of always printing and displaying the ACN in the format XXX XXX XXX; three blocks of three characters, each block separated by a blank.
acn.title: ACN

annual_revenue.description: The annual revenue of the company

birthday.description: The date of birth of the person.
birthday.title: Birth Date

deleted.description: Whether the company is deleted or not

description.example: Space Exploration Technologies Corp. is an American aerospace manufacturer, space transportation services and communications company headquartered in Hawthorne, California.

fax.description: The fax number of the company

image.description: The Image URL of the company

industry.description: The industry represents the type of business the company is in.

ownership.description: The ownership indicates the type of ownership of the company.

payee_number.description: A payee number is a unique number that identifies a payee for tax purposes.
payee_number.title: Payee number

read_only.description: Whether the company is read-only or not
read_only.title: Read-only

sales_tax_number.description: A sales tax number is a unique number that identifies a company for tax purposes.
sales_tax_number.title: Sales tax number

salutation.description: A formal salutation for the person. For example, 'Mr', 'Mrs'

vat_number.description: The VAT number of the company

contact_name.description: Name of the contact person at the address

country.description: country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha-2.

county.description: Address field that holds a sublocality, such as a county

line1.description: Line 1 of the address e.g. number, street, suite, apt #, etc.

salutation.description: Salutation of the contact person at the address

string.description: The address string. Some APIs don't provide structured address data.

RowVersion.description: A binary value used to detect updates to a object and prevent data conflicts. It is incremented each time an update is made to the object.
RowVersion.title: Row version

account_name.description: The name which you used in opening your bank account.
account_name.title: Bank Account Name

account_number.description: A bank account number is a number that is tied to your bank account. If you have several bank accounts, such as personal, joint, business (and so on), each account will have a different account number.
account_number.title: Bank Account Number

bank_code.description: A bank code is a code assigned by a central bank, a bank supervisory body or a Bankers Association in a country to all its licensed member banks or financial institutions.
bank_code.title: Bank Code

branch_identifier.description: A branch identifier is a unique identifier for a branch of a bank or financial institution.
branch_identifier.title: Branch Identifier

bsb_number.description: A BSB is a 6 digit numeric code used for identifying the branch of an Australian or New Zealand bank or financial institution.
bsb_number.title: BSB Number

routing_number.description: A routing number is a nine-digit code used to identify a financial institution in the United States.
routing_number.title: Routing number

Currency.description: Indicates the associated currency for an amount of money. Values correspond to [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).
Currency.title: Currency

description.description: More information about the custom field
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field.
id.title: ID

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.

id.description: Unique identifier for the email address

FirstName.description: The first name of the person.
FirstName.title: First name

LastName.description: The last name of the person.
LastName.title: Last name

area_code.description: The area code of the phone number, e.g. 323
area_code.title: Area code

country_code.description: The country code of the phone number, e.g. +1
country_code.title: Country code

extension.description: The extension of the phone number
extension.title: Phone extension

id.description: Unique identifier of the phone number
Unique identifier of the social link

type.description: Type of the social link, e.g. twitter

url.description: URL of the social link, e.g. https://www.twitter.com/apideck

$ul: **data**
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource
**operation**: Operation performed
**resource**: Unified API resource name
**service**: Apideck ID of service provider
**status**: HTTP Response Status
**status_code**: HTTP Response Status Code
**detail**: Contains parameter or domain specific information related to the error and why it occurred.
**error**: Contains an explanation of the status_code as defined in HTTP/1.1 standard (RFC 7231)
**message**: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.
**ref**: Link to documentation of error type
